trans-unit.source: Provides a dialog box, which prompts for account information of a Windows Service application.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma caixa de diálogo que solicita informações de conta de um aplicativo de serviço Windows.

trans-unit.source: Normally, you do not use the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> class directly within your code; this dialog is generally used by the installation utility for a Windows Service application.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você não usar o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> classe diretamente em seu código; essa caixa de diálogo geralmente é usada pelo utilitário de instalação de um aplicativo de serviço do Windows.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> object has the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> set to `User`, and either the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> is an empty string (""), then the installation utility uses <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> to prompt for these values.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> objeto tem o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> definida como `User`e o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> ou <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), em seguida, usa o utilitário de instalação <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> para solicitar esses valores.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>; use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class methods and properties to display and manipulate the dialog.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> deriva <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>; use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> classe métodos e propriedades para exibir e manipular a caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: For example, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> to display the form, and then check the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> before validating the input text for the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> para exibir o formulário e, em seguida, verificar o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> antes de validar o texto de entrada para o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> e <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> does not check the credentials and privileges for the specified account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> não verifica as credenciais e privilégios para a conta especificada.

trans-unit.source: For example, the user might enter an invalid account name and password for the computer, or the account might not have the correct privileges to run as a service.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o usuário pode inserir um nome inválido e a senha para o computador ou a conta talvez não tenha os privilégios corretos para ser executado como um serviço.

trans-unit.source: Validate the user input to ensure that the installed service runs successfully.
trans-unit.target: Valide o entrada do usuário para garantir que o serviço instalado seja executado com êxito.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> to prompt the user for a service installation account.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa um <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> para solicitar ao usuário para uma conta de instalação do serviço.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do formulário de conta de serviço.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> form has its <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> set to <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult.OK>, the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> set to an empty string (""), and the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> set to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> formulário tem seu <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> definida como <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult.OK>, o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> definido como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("") e o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> definido como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: Begins running a standard application message loop and displays the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Inicia a execução de um loop de mensagem de aplicativo padrão e exibe o formulário de conta de serviço.

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> on a new <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> form; it is typically used for testing purposes.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é equivalente a chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> em um novo <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> formulário; ela é normalmente usada para fins de teste.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> on the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> form to display the dialog box in your application.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> no <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> formulário para exibir a caixa de diálogo em seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the password for the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a senha para o formulário de conta de serviço.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the password in the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa a senha no formulário de conta de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> does not validate the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> não valida o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> e <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> valores.

trans-unit.source: The dialog checks that the user confirms the password, but it does not authenticate the account credentials on the computer.
trans-unit.target: A caixa de diálogo verifica que o usuário confirma a senha, mas não autentica as credenciais da conta do computador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the dialog result for the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o resultado da caixa de diálogo para o formulário de conta de serviço.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult" /> indicating the user response to the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult" /> indicando que a resposta do usuário à caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="OK" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="OK" />.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> to prompt the user for the service installation account, then check the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> para solicitar ao usuário para a conta de instalação do serviço, em seguida, verifique o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: If the value is <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult.OK>, verify that the input <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> are valid.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult.OK>, verifique a entrada <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> e <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> são válidos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name for the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de usuário para o formulário de conta de serviço.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the user name in the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o nome de usuário no formulário de conta de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> does not validate the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> não valida o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> ou <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> valores.
